attributes.action: Enabling the whole country with free Wi-Fi hotspots.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
We believe that the whole country should begin the and champion the roll-out of free Wi-Fi hotspots for all to use.

This would:
a) Reduce the "Digital Divide" of the rich and poor.  Giving education to those whom may not otherwise have access to the information and research on the internet

b) Allow all members of the community to communicate to the E-Government Initiatives.

c) Enable businesses to fully utilize efficient mobile working

d) Send a clear message to the Global commercial community that that UK is one of the leading powers of the IT industry.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
